data.title: Bike Cult: Olympic Road Cycling 2016
data.text:
Olympic Games Road Cycling

2016 to 1896

Cycling is one of the original events of the modern Olympic Games since 1896.

Road cycling events were only for Amateur Men, until Womens events in 1984, and Professionals in 1996.

Mens Team title awarded from 1912 to 1956, based on each nation's top four Road Race placings.
